summary: MAMA - Before the son was a legend amongst the crypto community, he had humble beginnings. Raised by a single Mother, she set out the foundations of Pepe's success. As hard times came, nothing beat the love of a mother. Giving confidence to Pepe through his entire journey. MAMA is not only the mother of Pepe but of ETH as a whole and with that same love ETH will rise against Solana!
